text: Kerplunk (also known as Kerplunk!) is the second full-length album by punk rock band Green Day. It was released on January 17, 1992 by Lookout! Records. ==Track listing== == Personnel == * Billie Joe Armstrong – vocals, guitar, drums on "Dominated Love Slave" * Mike Dirnt – bass, backing vocals * Tré Cool – drums, vocals and guitar on "Dominated Love Slave" * John Kiffmeyer, a.k.a. Al Sobrante – drums on "Sweet Children", "Best Thing in Town", "Strangeland" and "My Generation" ==Sources== == Other websites == * Kerplunk LP on greendaydiscography.com Category:Green Day albums Category:1992 albums Category:Punk albums
title: Kerplunk (album)
